newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Main principles, aims of Russia-Belarus Union.
newsitem.headline: Main principles, aims of Russia-Belarus Union.

text.p: Here are the basic principles and main aims of the union between Russia and Belarus as outlined by Russian President Boris Yeltsin at a signing ceremony on Friday.
BASIC PRINCIPLES AND MAIN OBLIGATIONS OF PARTICIPANTS:
Guaranteeing free activities for political parties and organisations including the opposition;
Ensuring investor rights in the union;
Forging further legal relations of brotherhood, friendship and cooperation between Russia and Belarus;
Increasing living standards and creating favourable conditions for human development and social economic progress;
Using market mechanisms to unite the potential of the two countries;
Providing security and boosting possibilities for coordinated fighting against crime;
Step-by-step formation of a unified currency system, taking the European experience into account;
Joint financing of programmes in the energy, machine-building, electronics, defence and textile spheres.
